parameters.name: StackName
parameters.description: The name of the stack with which the entitlement is associated.

parameters.name: Attributes
parameters.description: The attributes of the entitlement. (dict) --- An attribute associated with an entitlement. Application entitlements work by matching a supported SAML 2.0 attribute name to a value when a user identity federates to an Amazon AppStream 2.0 SAML application. A supported AWS IAM SAML PrincipalTag attribute that is matched to the associated value when a user identity federates into an Amazon AppStream 2.0 SAML application. The following are valid values: roles department organization groups title costCenter userType A value that is matched to a supported SAML attribute name when a user identity federates into an Amazon AppStream 2.0 SAML application.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: A supported AWS IAM SAML PrincipalTag attribute that is matched to the associated value when a user identity federates into an Amazon AppStream 2.0 SAML application. The following are valid values:

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A value that is matched to a supported SAML attribute name when a user identity federates into an Amazon AppStream 2.0 SAML application.

nested_items.name: StackName
nested_items.description: The name of the stack with which the entitlement is associated.

nested_items.name: AppVisibility
nested_items.description: Specifies whether all or selected apps are entitled.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A supported AWS IAM SAML PrincipalTag attribute that is matched to the associated value when a user identity federates into an Amazon AppStream 2.0 SAML application.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A value that is matched to a supported SAML attribute name when a user identity federates into an Amazon AppStream 2.0 SAML application.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the entitlement was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The time when the entitlement was last modified.
